item.title: 英国要求房东提高住房能源效率
item.description: 英国能源部长周一表示，英国将要求房东在本十年结束前提高全国住宅的能源效率。【原文：The UK will require landlords to improve the energy efficiency of homes across the country by the end of this decade, the energy minister said Monday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预计未来三年石油和天然气收入将减少
item.description: 由于能源价格下跌以及俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）税收制度更加宽松，俄罗斯政府认为其石油和天然气收入将在未来三年内下降。【原文：The Russian government sees its oil and gas revenue falling for the next three years due to lower energy prices and a more lenient tax regime for Gazprom PJSC.】

item.title: 法国亿万富翁对巴尼耶的富人税信号表示认同
item.description: 法国航运业亿万富翁罗多尔夫-萨德（Rodolphe Saade）表示，他的公司准备缴纳更多的税款，以帮助修复法国捉襟见肘的公共财政，这表明法国一些最富有的公民可能开始对政府政策的转变感到不满。【原文：French shipping billionaire Rodolphe Saade said his company is ready to contribute more tax to help repair France’s stretched public finances, indicating resignation may be setting in among some of the country’s wealthiest citizens to a shift in government policy.】

item.title: Telegram 首席执行官杜罗夫称应用程序将向政府提供更多数据
item.description: 消息应用 Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）表示，Telegram 将根据有效的法律要求向有关当局提供用户的 IP 地址和电话号码。【原文：Messaging app Telegram will provide users’ IP addresses and phone numbers to relevant authorities in response to valid legal requests, according to Chief Executive Officer Pavel Durov.】

item.title: 美联储讲话推动国债收益率走高，未来将有债券供应
item.description: 周一，债券收益率攀升，原因是在一系列国债拍卖之前出现了大量新的公司债券，而美联储官员的言论也打消了再次降息半个百分点的预期。【原文：Bond yields climbed Monday as a raft of new corporate debt preceded a series of Treasury auctions and comments by Federal Reserve officials discouraged expectations for another half-point interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 一个局外人批评了 Meta 的智能眼镜。现在她掌管着它们
item.description:
Li-Chen Miller 正在帮助领导社交网络实现扎克伯格的增强现实雄心

。【原文：

Li-Chen Miller is helping lead the social network’s push toward Zuckerberg’s augmented reality ambitions

】

item.title: 微软首席执行官致网络团队不要告诉我一切有多好
item.description:
在经历了一系列令人尴尬的黑客攻击事件后，纳德拉公司每周都会召开会议，对加强软件恢复能力的工作进行评估。【原文：

Nadella is holding weekly meetings to assess efforts to shore up software resilience after a series of embarrassing hacks.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行开始降息之际，欧盟银行盈利能力创下新高
item.description: 就在欧洲中央银行近五年来首次降息之际，欧洲顶级银行的盈利能力创下了历史新高。【原文：The profitability of Europe’s top banks hit a record high just as the European Central Bank cut interest rates for the first time in almost five years.】

item.title: 美国参议员寻求阻止墨西哥接管沃尔坎港
item.description: 一个由两党议员组成的美国参议员团体正在提议立法，向墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔施压，要求其放弃征用阿拉巴马州沃尔坎材料公司的一个港口和石灰石采石场的计划。【原文：A bipartisan group of US senators is proposing legislation to pressure Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador to back down from plans to expropriate a port and limestone quarry from Alabama’s Vulcan Materials Co.】

item.title: 体育直播的非法流媒体已成为主流。还能做些什么吗？
item.description: 广播公司正面临着全球范围内非法体育直播流媒体的激增，这使他们失去了数百亿美元的潜在收入，而他们似乎对此无能为力。【原文：Broadcasters are facing a worldwide surge in illegal streaming of live sports that’s depriving them of tens of billions of dollars in potential revenue, and there seems to be little they can do about it.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔在 60 年来最严重的干旱中提前开始停电
item.description: 在旱情创历史新高的情况下，厄瓜多尔本周原计划在夜间进行的滚动停电提前到了白天。【原文：Rolling blackouts initially planned for overnight hours in Ecuador this week were moved ahead into daytime amid a record drought.】

item.title: 基夫称汇丰希望加入人工智能基础设施融资热潮
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一位资深投资银行家表示，该公司希望加入为人工智能所需的基础设施融资的大潮。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc wants to join in the rush to finance the infrastructure needed to roll out artificial intelligence, according to one of the lender’s most senior investment bankers.】

item.title: TPG 准备以约 18 亿美元的价格完成首只二级市场基金的募集
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司预计将在未来几个月内完成其在美国和欧洲的第一支二级基金，资金高达 18 亿美元，高于其最初的目标。【原文：TPG Inc. expects to close its first secondaries fund in the US and Europe in the coming months with as much as $1.8 billion, above its original goal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行观察家关注自民党选举，只为一位候选人
item.description: 日本央行的观察家们正密切关注日本执政党自民党的领导层选举，以了解其对货币政策前景的潜在影响，关注的焦点是一个强烈主张维持宽松立场的党派。【原文：Bank of Japan watchers are keeping a close eye on the leadership election of the nation’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party for potential implications on the monetary policy outlook, with attention focused on a strong advocate of maintaining an easing stance.】

item.title: Wayfair 将从高收益债券市场借款 7 亿美元
item.description: 在线家具零售商 Wayfair LLC 正寻求从垃圾债券市场借款 7 亿美元，为现有到期债券再融资。【原文：Online furniture retailer Wayfair LLC is looking to borrow $700 million from the junk-bond market to refinance existing maturities.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告匈牙利经济风险将导致福林下滑
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）警告福林将大幅下挫，并加入了认为匈牙利面临财政和货币政策风险交织的策略师行列。【原文：Morgan Stanley warned of a steep selloff in the forint, joining the ranks of strategists who see Hungary facing a confluence of fiscal and monetary-policy risks.】

item.title: 拜登政府提议禁止使用中国和俄罗斯汽车零部件
item.description: 拜登政府正在提议制定一项规则，阻止销售和进口中国和俄罗斯制造的用于联网汽车的硬件和软件，从而有可能加强美国的安全，抵御商务部称之为 "非常真实 "的黑客攻击威胁。【原文：The Biden administration is proposing a rule to block the sale and import of Chinese- and Russian-made hardware and software for connected vehicles, potentially bolstering US security against a hacking threat that the Commerce Department describes as “very real.”】

item.title: 欧盟将为较贫穷国家发行绿色债券提供补贴
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周一表示，欧盟将帮助降低贫困国家发行绿色债券的成本。【原文：The European Union will help reduce the costs of issuing green bonds in poorer countries, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Monday.】

item.title: 瑞银认为马莎百货因市场份额增长而创下 2015 年新高
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的分析师称，随着英国零售商的食品和服装赢得更多顾客，玛莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）飙升的股价将创下近九年来的新高。【原文：Marks & Spencer Group Plc’s soaring shares are set to hit highs not seen in almost nine years as the UK retailer wins more customers for its food and clothing, according to analysts at UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 激进分子在向大亨维特克发出的邀请中认为伊莫菲南兹公司有 32% 的上涨空间
item.description: 激进投资者 Petrus Advisers Ltd 希望与奥地利房东 Immofinanz AG 的主要所有者、捷克亿万富翁拉多万-维特克（Radovan Vitek）的 CPI Property Group SA 商讨 "战略替代方案"。【原文：Activist investor Petrus Advisers Ltd wants to discuss “strategic alternatives” for Austrian landlord Immofinanz AG with the company’s main owner, Czech billionaire Radovan Vitek’s CPI Property Group SA.】

item.title: 梅洛尼正在努力设计意大利贷款人可以接受的银行征税办法
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）正在寻找一种方法，向银行和保险公司征税，以帮助国家预算融资，而这种方法不会像以前的尝试那样陷入困境。【原文：Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni is looking for a way to extract a levy from banks and insurers to help finance the country’s budget that won’t flounder like previous attempts.】

item.title: 捷克计划第四季度在当地市场出售欧元债券
item.description: 捷克共和国正在考虑两年多来首次在国内市场上出售以欧元计价的债券。【原文：The Czech Republic is considering selling bonds denominated in euros on the domestic market for the first time in more than two years.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克称大幅减息刺激劳动力市场，但步伐尚未确定
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，随着通胀和就业之间的风险变得更加平衡，央行以大幅举措启动削减周期将有助于使利率更接近中性水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said starting the central bank’s cutting cycle with a large move will help bring interest rates closer to neutral levels as the risks between inflation and employment become more balanced.】

item.title: 英国几乎不再烧煤。下一个是天然气吗？
item.description:
英国政府希望到 2030 年实现清洁电网，但运营商表示这一定义仍在制定中。【原文：

The British government wants a clean electric grid by 2030, though the operator says that definition is still being worked out.

】

item.title: 巴伊瓦债务谈判将随着重组报告的到期而加剧
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国大宗商品集团 BayWa AG 最快将于下周一分发重组意见书初稿，为其 50 亿欧元债务负担的进一步谈判提供基础。【原文：German commodities group BayWa AG is set to circulate the first draft of a restructuring opinion as soon as Monday, according to people with knowledge of the matter, providing the basis for further negotiations over its €5 billion debt load.】

item.title: 欧元区经济摇摇欲坠助推欧洲央行加快降息步伐
item.description: 欧元区主要私营部门经济调查报告的震荡下滑为欧洲中央银行加快降息提供了理由，至少在投资者看来是这样。【原文：A shock decline in the euro zone’s main survey of the private sector economy just gave the European Central Bank a reason to speed up interest-rate cuts — at least in the eyes of investors.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后，高盛更加看涨英镑
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）押注英镑将成为美联储降息后美元长期疲软的最大受益者之一。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is betting the pound will be one of the biggest beneficiaries of prolonged weakness in the dollar after the Federal Reserve slashed interest rates.】

item.title: 融资紧缩 瑞典 Northvolt 将裁员 20
item.description: 瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 将在全球范围内裁员 20%，并暂停扩建其位于瑞典北部的主要工厂，以应对电动汽车需求放缓带来的融资紧缩。【原文：Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB will shed 20% of its headcount globally and suspend the expansion of its main factory in Northern Sweden to stem a financing crunch as electric-vehicle demand slows.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 StandardAero 首次公开募股计划筹资 11 亿美元
item.description: StandardAero Inc. 正寻求在首次公开募股中筹资 11 亿美元，此前其支持者凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：StandardAero Inc. is seeking to raise $1.1 billion in its initial public offering, after its backer Carlyle Group Inc. had decided to pursue a listing for the aircraft maintenance services provider rather than a sale.】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能增强型 Gmail 难以证明其价格合理
item.description: 谷歌的人工智能升级版 Gmail 让我欲罢不能，不知道是否值得支付高昂的订阅费。但首先...【原文：Google’s AI-upgraded Gmail has left me wanting and wondering if it’s worth the lofty subscription fee. But first...】
